message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering our product! We're excited to discuss the details with you. We're willing to offer you the product for $950000. We believe this is a fair price considering the value it brings to your business.

Thanks for the offer Alice, but $950000 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with. Considering the product's value, I'm willing to pay $850000. This is a fair price that reflects both our interests. Let's see if we can reach an agreement.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. We appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, we're still a bit above our minimum target. We're willing to meet you halfway and offer the product for $900000. We believe this is a fair price that balances our interests.

Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $900000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $875000. This is a fair price that reflects the value of the product and my budget. Let's close the deal at this price.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. We appreciate your flexibility. However, we're still a bit apart. We're willing to make one more concession and offer the product for $885000. We believe this is a fair price that takes into account the value of the product and our minimum target.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $885000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $870000. This is a fair price that reflects the value of the product and my budget. Let's close the deal at this price. If we can't reach an agreement, I might need to explore other options.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. We understand your concerns, but we're getting close to our minimum target. We're willing to make one more concession and offer the product for $880000. We believe this is a fair price that balances our interests and takes into account the value of the product.

Alice, we're getting close. While I appreciate your flexibility, $880000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you at $875000. This would be a mutually beneficial agreement, allowing us to close the deal and get the product to me quickly. If we can't agree on this price, I may have to consider other options.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. We're getting close to a deal, but we're not quite there yet. We're willing to make one more concession and offer the product for $882500. We believe this is a fair price that takes into account the value of the product and our minimum target.
